data.name: the Array constructor is on the fritz!
data.description:
#### Something very weird is happening with arrays! 

#### Array literals seem to work well enough, but arrays from the Array function are oddly glitchy... 

#### Before you start trying to figure out the cause, a notification pops up on your screen. It's a message from that one prankster coworker to the entire office: 
> Anyone notice anything wrong with their arrays this morning? I'll buy lunch for whoever figures out what I did and how to fix it... as long as you can figure it out before the boss notices and yells at me to stop it :)

### Oh dear :/


###### *Any help making this kata harder to figure out would be appreciated :)*
